attributes.additional_details: To get the route the Olympic torch will take around the UK to include passing the factory where it was made, in the Bayton Road Industrial Estate, Bedworth, Warwickshire. Currently the route does not include anywhere in the entire Borough of Nuneaton and Bedworth at all!

rejection.details:
The responsibility for all aspects of staging the Games, including the Torch Relay, is that of the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG) who are a private organisation operating independently of Government.

LOCOG can be contacted by writing to: London 2012, One Churchill Place, Canary Wharf, London E14 5LN; Tel: 0203 2012 000; or email: enquiries@london2012.com.
